lyrics:
1 ContributorThe Turn (A Pagan Lament) LyricsI took a turn into the world of pop
Everything I'd learned I abruptly dropped
I'd seen the woods and its shining arches

And while I prepare words with little meaning
They classify my work for the Western world

Ice in the woods, now my spring is over
My path to the sea is now a dusty street

The lights in the night hide the blues and greens
My mind like a knife cuts the softened things
Oh, where are my eyes? Hiding in the forest
And where is my voice? In the MP3

I'm cold as the stone, you know I can't be glad
And my love is sold, and my soul is sapped
Oh come to the shore where the walkway's broken
Pay tears to the sea, she will be your queen

Oh I took a turn, oh I took a turn, oh I...

Under skies I’ve nеver seen?
Will I lose myself between (E mafai he mafai e)
My home and what's unknown?

Leaving all I love behind

Can I go beyond?


[Verse 2: Auli'i Cravalho]
There is destiny in motion
And it's only just begun
Now will this life I’ve worked so hard for come undone?

They're calling me
I must reply

[Chorus: Auli'i Cravalho & Te Vaka]
What lies beyond (E mafai he mafai e)

All that we know right here (Ake ake)

[Chorus: Auli'i Cravalho & Te Vaka]

And although I don't know when

I am Moana

I must go, I will go, they will know (Fakamalohi, talitonuga, te nofoaga)
What lies beyond (E mafai he mafai e)

17 ContributorsLiving Well Is the Best Revenge LyricsThis song is the opening track to the 2008 album Accelerate and served in R.E.M’s return to rock music. The title is a reference to the George Herbert book of proverbs, Jacula Prudentium.

I've got to fall in another direction

Where is the ripcord, the trapdoor, the key?
Where is the cartoon escape-hatch for me?
No time to question the choices I make
I've got to fall in another direction

Ayo (Ah)
Ayo

[Verse 1: Westside Gunn]
Ayo, woke up, brushed my teeth, looked in the mirror, seen my handsome face
I barely couldn't sleep, I'm 'bout to make a hundred grand today (Ah)
Helmut Lang sweats with the splashes
Kiss Asa on the forehead and grab the ratchet
Ferrari Stradale in the garage, Reece Cooper in the lodge
Met my plug at the racetrack, his roof had stars
Dior duffle with two fifty, bought ten, he fronted ten
I sell my shits for thirty-five, I got a template 'bout to hit
Hit my nigga out in Cleveland, he can meet me out in Arеs
Said he was gon' bring his cousin, nigga actin' kinda scary
I said, "Bool" (Bool), "Meet me at five, samе place every time"
Somethin' 'bout this time, though, it had a bad vibe
Got there 4:58, hit him up, he said he pullin' in
I hopped out, went to the trunk, and then removed the ten
He got out, talkin' all loud, laughin'
Where his bag? I'm thinkin', then I seen his cousin grabbed it
Somethin' don't feel right
Let me get this three-fifty, then I'm out, I ain't even 'bout to count
Went to grab the gym bag, then I seen the forty flash
Nigga said, "Give it up", my heart start beatin' fast
Gave it up, then them niggas sped off in the wagon (Skrrt)
Then I made a call, I need them dead, but they was taxin' (Ah)
I didn't give a fuck, them niggas pussy (Them niggas pussy)
Word is his cousin on the force, but he a rookie
Live in Cleveland Heights, got a wife and three kids, we need the addy (We need the addy)
Make sure we get the ten bricks back, get at me
Two hours later, the fuck nigga got to his house
Put the gym bag down, then he fell on the couch
Thought he hit a good one, then he heard a noise upstairs
Called his wife name, no response, he hopped up out the chair
Went up the staircase, heard his newborn cryin'
Walked in the nursery, then bullets start flyin' (Boom, boom, boom, boom, boom, boom, boom, boom, boom, boom, boom, boom, boom, boom)
Wife was tied up, seven hit the nigga, tore his ass up
My nigga jetted down the stairs, grabbed the bag, they was outta there (Skrrt)
Three hours later, got my ten bricks back (Got my ten bricks back)
Kissed Asa on the forehead, good night (Good night)


[Verse 2: Slick Rick]
The rookie cop fam not havin' it, intelligence was hella bent
Once upon a time when the swag was in development
What is kinfolk if two shots ring to see a bag drop?
I speed in SUVs, back wind so
Inchin' up, viewin' what I'm doin', gun crewin'
It was about hundred thou', I returned it since I knew him
Said, "Fast life, my nigga", please don't ask 'bout it, Richard
Later on, breaking news, chalk outline a bitch, hurt
A noise outside, see cops all tense
With apprehend, gun flyin' over backyard fence
With a shot to his leg, he damn near bust in my crib
Didn't sight excited, tied it, "Hide me, hide me"
Boom, boom, boom, "No, I didn't see any flee from the-"
Check thorough, best lay here 'til tomorrow
Then tweeze out the bullet, so I bandage it, said "Thank you, Rick"
And once we were far in the trunk of my car
Said, "Got it from here", one of his peers, yeah, so I let him out
And now gettin' tortured, askin' questions 'bout his whereabouts

[Outro: Big Pootie & Asa Worthy]
Asa, can you say "Daddy"?
Daddy

149 ContributorsBetween Villains LyricsEarl Sweatshirt recently showed up on Captain Murphy’s (aka Flying Lotus) song for Adult Swim Singles 2013 along with Viktor Vaughn (aka MF Doom) and Brainfeeder (Flying Lotus’ label) bassist Thundercat.

The… Read More [Verse 1: Viktor Vaughn]
Vik, the wild islander, bringing out the child in ya
Singing out the silencer with more violence than "Heil Hitler"
He get some looks, some bullshit Bulova, a dusty pullover, and a Pulitzer
A must we bust your crusty subwoofer sister
Foes is just bluffin', clear your nose from huff-puffin'
A glutton for bludgeoning blood gushin', here ya go, studmuffin
It’s nothin', get it on the get-by
Bet it on a dead guy, jetted on the red eye
Too many make mistake fillers, not enough live wires
Too many fake killers, and jive sires
Dropped these bombs on a critic from a grass knoll
Everybody got one, your mom's is a asshole
S.O.B. and smug to the utmost
Cut it close and catch a slug to the gut bows, word to Thutmose
What's worse, clutch your purse close, lady
We get more cheese bread for the baby, toast to Grady, one-eighty

[Verse 2: Earl Sweatshirt]
I'm in the cut, looking for some puss to pick apart
Dirty like us riding in the whip that really isn't ours
Storming out the door, don't press record, I hate my fuckin' voice
Trying to kill that noise, performing fill that void slightly
I'm swimming in water that's been dicey since landing
And I'm owing these niggas nothing like all that I've been handed
For free, don't pan your cameras to me
Ho, don't command me to speak
Got these little niggas swinging from the banister, on 'Fax in his pajamas
Walking slow because the Camels keep his stamina weak
And you could catch him like some halibut after a bad accident
Trying to get jaw-jacked right where the catheter peeks–out
Villain, Earl, and Captain in command of your street now
Rapping good as motherfucking janitors sweep now
Getting business handled, get the cannabis cheap now
It's a bunch of nuggets on him like it's sand on a beach towel


[Verse 3: Captain Murphy]
Captain's back (Yay!) So go on put your mic away
(Where?) Inside a microwave (Oh.)
When I die, I bet you Mike'll wave (Hee-hee)
We blowing bubbles at the Pearly Gates
Took a selfie with the king but only see my face
I’m writing darker pieces in my thesis
I’m hiding in the park with all your nieces, trading head for Reese's Pieces
Interjectin' niggas' verses with this book of witches' curses
I cast a spell upon your bitches, but my thirst is for the hearses
I’m spilling out my innards to these N-words, journey inwards
Caught her quarter past the moment, got a cord of past opponents
In a fragment of a moment, man, I killed that rap then owned it
Hope to overtake the planet, with my banana in a hammock
Bitch manic, parents panic, I’m a mechanic with these patterns
Propagandic with that chatter, matter of fact the Madder Hatter
Never mind the hammer, manners out the window, pump crescendo
Puff the endo, I’m Lou Ferrigno, just pretendo
Don’t ask him where the pen go
'Cause the pencil got me paper paid and paydirt made the pain hurt
With the Mask and faded Sweatshirt – nothing lesser
Bet you’ll never ever guess what I left under the dresser
Hid a message in the 808 to pester all the Heshers

2 ContributorsThe Treehouse Song LyricsWhen I woke
I took the backdoor to my mind
And then I spoke
I counted all of the good things you are

Longer than my chain of broken hearts

I figured I had already lost

3 ContributorsLinger with Pleasure LyricsI’ll rent a house somewhere
I’ll listen to Biosphere

A straight line in the atmosphere

And I’ll linger with pleasure

Is the whispering wind or the sunlight
I’ll leave all disturbants at home
The evening papers and the telephone
But I’ll bring my memories
Despite everything
I hope life will miss me

Maybe this is wishful thinking
And maybe I’ll just keep on sinking
But sometimes it’s enough to know
That there is a place where everything is on hold
Where the hours will be longer
And I’ll linger with pleasure

lyrics:
1 ContributorThe Cat Came Back Lyrics[Verse 1]
Well, old farmer Johnson, he had troubles of his own
He had an ornery cat just wouldn't leave his home
He tried and he tried to give that cat away
He gave him to a man going far, far away

[Chorus]
But the cat came back the very next day
Yes, the cat came back, they thought he was a goner
But the cat came back, he just wouldn't stay away

[Verse 2]
Now, old brother Bill swore he'd kill that cat on sight
He loaded up his gun with rocks and dynamite
He waited, and he waited for that cat to come around
Forty-seven pieces of old Bill was all they found

[Chorus]
But the cat came back the very next day
Yes, the cat came back, they thought he was a goner
You know the cat came back, he just wouldn't stay away

[Spoken]
Groovy
Everybody in the sixties knew that one
I don't remember the sixties
It's not what you think, it's cause he's too old
We're gonna need your help later in this song
We're gonna need you to make a cat noise that sounds like this
Or if you're a soprano, that sounds like this


[Verse 3]
That cat was a possesser of a family of his own
Seven little kittens till there was a cyclone
The house began to shudder, there were buildings all around
Not a single trace of one of those poor little kittens was ever found

[Chorus]
But the cat came back the very next day
Yes, the cat came back, they thought he was a goner
But the cat came back, he just wouldn't stay away

[Verse 4]
Know, they gave him to a man going up in a balloon
They told him for to give him to the man on the moon
The balloon got busted, and down it spinned
Fifteen miles up they found that man dead

[Chorus]
But the cat came back the very next day
Yes, the cat came back, they thought he was a goner
But the cat came back, he just wouldn't stay away

[Spoken]
I apologize ahead of time for this last verse for the cat lovers in the audience
But if you're feeling queezy at this point, you might want to go over to the side door over there and get your air sickness bags
At the very least, get out your earplugs, your hankys, your night shades
Whatever it takes to get through this last verse
And keep repeating to yourself, "It's only a song"
The rest of you, think long and hard the next time you're at a fair and your standing in line for one of those Polish sausages


[Verse 5]
Well, they took him to the butcher where that meat was ground
They put him in the hopper when the butcher wasn't round
The cat went in with a blood-curdling scream, meow
Thank you, cat lovers
And the town's meat was furry for more than a week

[Chorus]
But the cat came back the very next day
Yes, the cat came back, they thought he was a goner
You know the cat came back, he just wouldn't stay away
Just wouldn't stay away
Just wouldn't stay away

genre: Jazz, Latin, Pop, Folk, World, & Country
Jazz, Latin, Pop, Folk, World, & Country
lyrics:
1 ContributorStop Lyrics[Couplet : LIM]
Ça y est cette année j'arrête
Faut que je range la mitraillette
Les balles à ailettes
Fils de pute finit la fête
Faut que j'arrête et que je me mette à prendre le droit chemin
Pour le fajr mon Dieu j'aimerai me lever chaque matin
Faut que j'arrête le hram, les histoires de rame De rum rum, faut je range la lame
Wesh le teum teum
Faut que j'arrête la fonce-dé ça mène nulle part
Je traîne de bar en bar
J'ai toujours autant le cafard
Faut que je m'arrête avant qu'on m'assassine
Quand je suis sorti de réa c'était plus qu'un signe
Faut que j'arrête l'illicites
Mais l'illicites c'est toute ma vie
Je compte plus les sales histoires que j'ai vécu sur le parvis
Eh oué j'arrête tout, discret comme un Indou posé sur le transat d'une plage du Lavandou
Faut que je m'arrête, faut que je m'arrête
Faut que je m'arrête
Pas facile quand tu connais pas la recette

[Refrain x2 : Zeler]
Écoute bien le terrain c'est notre quotidien
On a rien sans rien donc on ce tend la main
Frangin, faut je m'arrête mais j'ai plus de frein
Frangin, faut je m'arrête mais j'ai plus de frein


[Couplet : Zeler]
Frangin, y a trop de chiens qui mérite des coups de reins
En plus ils sont pleins et ça se plaind
À la baraque le frigo vide se re fini plein
La vie c'est pas le terrain mais je le sais bien
Faut que je mette un frein, ils sont sur mes reins
Je suis sur la A1 pisté en R1
Je me barre de là pour m'aérer
Je fume la cali j'pars je suis en train de erer
Déterminé pour tout arrêter
Pour tout arrêter, avant de ce faire péter
Avant de ce faire lever, avant de ce faire crever Avant de regretter
Décidé aujourd'hui j'arrête tout
Aujourd'hui je crache sur tout
Je veux pas décédé c'est tout

[Refrain x2 : Zeler]
Écoute bien le terrain c'est notre quotidien
On a rien sans rien donc on ce tend la main
Frangin, faut je m'arrête mais j'ai plus de frein
Frangin, faut je m'arrête mais j'ai plus de frein

[Couplet : LIM & Zeler]
Faut que j'arrête mais j'ai plus de frein
Des morts y en as combien
Des fils de tapin y en as combien
Stop les conneries, fini la charbonnerie
Fuck leurs psychiatrie
Fuck leurs piraterie
Adios Amigo
Numéro 10 comme Diego
Faut qu j'arrête tout même à fumer le bédo
Car faut bien que ça s'arrête un jour
Il est temps que ma haine se transforme en amour


[X2]
J'ai plus de frein frangin
Là je dois penser aux miens
Faut que je fasse honneurs aux miens
J'en place une pour Foued le Magicien
J'ai mes deux pieds, deux mains
Pédé fais pas le malin

[Refrain x2 : Zeler]
Écoute bien le terrain c'est notre quotidien
On a rien sans rien donc on ce tend la main
Frangin, faut je m'arrête mais j'ai plus de frein
Frangin, faut je m'arrête mais j'ai plus de frein

lyrics:
5 ContributorsAYE Lyrics[Songtext zu „AYE“]

[Hook: Maestro]
Rolis, droppen Dope in Socken
Guck, wir speeden, Police stoppen
Gib dir miese, mach' paar Riesen
Top-Ten, zielen, schießen
Over, Rolis, droppen Dope in Socken
Guck, wir speeden, Police stoppen
Gib dir miese, mach' paar Riesen
Top-Ten, zielen, schießen, aye

[Part 1: Mois]
Die Kette bestellt, Steine sind hell auch in der Nacht
Wir fahr'n zu schnell, wеißer SL, kille den Blunt
Dеr Bulle erkennt den Wagen und hält mich wieder an
Doch wieder mal keine Papiere dabei, du weißt, ich leb' illegal
Wir cruisen im Drop-top, das Geld für die Steine haram (Für die Steine haram)
Ich komm' aus dem Loch, doch ich trage dein Haus an mei'm Arm (Ha-ha)
Ich acker' nur non-stop und kaufe mir alles in bar, ja
Fick 31er (Ja), sie können mich niemals bezahl'n (Hehehe)

[Hook: Maestro]
Rolis, droppen Dope in Socken
Guck, wir speeden, Police stoppen
Gib dir miese, mach' paar Riesen
Top-Ten, zielen, schießen
Over, Rolis, droppen Dope in Socken
Guck, wir speeden, Police stoppen
Gib dir miese, mach' paar Riesen
Top-Ten, zielen, schießen, aye


[Part 2: Mois]
Ihr könnt die Scheiße nicht versteh'n, doch ich mache damit Cash (Cash)
Der Rücken deines Rückens, ja, sie rufen an bei Stress
Ich ficke deine Bull'n und ich ficke dein Gesetz
Wenn ich möchte, macht ihr morgen alle YouTube und kein'n Rap
Trage nur noch Designer, die Audemars ist besetzt
Jahrelang bis der Hype kam, heute nur VVS (Diamonds)
Siehst du mich in 'nem Daimler, dann nur im GTS-Black
Und wenn ich heute vorbeifahr', zeigt mir jeder Respekt (Hehehe)

[Hook: Maestro]
Rolis, droppen Dope in Socken
Guck, wir speeden, Police stoppen
Gib dir miese, mach' paar Riesen
Top-Ten, zielen, schießen
Over, Rolis, droppen Dope in Socken
Guck, wir speeden, Police stoppen
Gib dir miese, mach' paar Riesen
Top-Ten, zielen, schießen, aye

track_title: Me Amas Y Me Djas Vs Te Amo, Te Extrano
lyrics:
1 ContributorMe Amas Y Me Dejas vs Te Amo, Te Extraño LyricsMe sigue haciendo daño, tu forma de quererme
Me sigue haciendo daño, no se como entenderte
Dices que me quieres
Dices que me amas
Pero de mi te alejas, cuando te da la gana

No se que hacer, con este querer
Me amas y me dejas llorandote

No se que hacer

Y el dolor
Loque me pasa ami
Eso le pasa a cualquiera
No es cosa de reir

No te desesperes
Dale tiempo al tiempo
Cuando mas oscurece
Es porque va amanecer

Yo deseaba encontrar un día
Motivos de llenar mi vida
Sin saberlo como adivinas
Llegaste tú
Alegrando contu sonrisa
Con tu magia mujer divina
Con tu cuerpo, con tu hermosura
Puedo vivir


Te quiero
Te amo
Te extraño
Te llamo
Ahora que estás a mi lado soy muy feliz

Ahora que estás a mi lado siento que eres lo anhelado
Quiero saber si por siempre conmigo estaras
Apareces danzando en mi alma con tu frágil y sútil figura
Y me hablas cosas tan lindas que me haces feliz

Te quiero
Te amo
Te extraño
Te amo
Ahora que estás a mi lado soy muy feliz

Con tu mano ya no estoy solo voy andando feliz y todo
Me parece ahora más lindo cuando tú estás
Caminaba en las calles tristes todo me parecía simple
La alegría de las personas no era en mí

De noche y de día te amo
De noche y de día te extraño
De noche y de día te llamo soy muy feliz

track_title: El Amor Más Grande Del Planeta

lyrics:
3 ContributorsPide Lo Que Quieras LyricsAy decir que te quiero es muy poquito pa lo que siento por ti
Si hasta el mar se me quedo pequeño de lo grande que es mi amor
Que te extraño es casi nada la verdad no se vivir sin ti
Y si no te veo te aseguro se entristece el corazon
Y no puedo creer te has convertido en mi fortuna
Hoy digo sin miedo que te amo como a ninguna
Por fin consegui la mujer que tanto he soñado
Y no cabe duda que me tiene enamorado
Yano tengo delo que ahora estoy sintiendo
Llegaste a mi vida cuando estaba enloqueciendo
Se marcharon las tristezas que me atormentaban
Si llego la niña que vino a alegrarme el almaaa
Pide lo que quieras que yo lo hago, lo hago, lo hago
Ahi yo no se bailar pero lo hago, por ti yo lo hago
Yo no escucho rock pero lo hago, si quieres yo lo hago
No canto reggaeton pero lo hago, por ti yo lo hago
Hoy puedo decirle a todo el mundo soy el hombre mas feliz
Si la mujer que tengo a mi lado se robo mi corazon
En ella encontre las cualidades que en otra no mjum no consegui
Y si no me entienden solo escuchen van a darme la razon
Cuando me ve triste me contenta con abrazos
Me toma las manos y me dice cuanto te amo
En mis decisiones ella siempre está presente
Se molesta cuando mal de mi le habla la gente
Cuando he fracasado yo escucho su voz de aliento
Palabras bonitas que a mi me ponen contento
Y la quiero mas por que se que adora a mi vieja
Y le pido a Dios que nunca me separe de ella
Y pide lo que quieras que yo lo hago, lo hago, lo hago
Ah pide lo que sea que yo lo hago, por ti yo lo hago
Yo no se bailar pero lo hago, por ti yo lo hago
Yo no bailo reggaeton pero lo hago, por ti yo lo hagooo
Ahi pide lo que sea que yo lo hago, lo hago, jaja
(end)

lyrics:
2 Contributors春雨裡洗過的太陽 (The Sun After Washed By Spring Rain) Lyrics分開之後另一年的春天

那些有你在身邊的影片
呼的一聲飛的老遠老遠

愛在夏天過完之後鎖在秋天
捱過冬天之後的我好了一些
嘿 雨後的天上 彩虹出現 襯出一片藍天

那是春雨裡洗過的太陽
每個冬季帶來失落 傷得多深
然後忽然看懂雲的形狀

愛情會天亮也一定會黑

1 ContributorSOLEDAD Lyrics[Letra de "SOLEDAD"]

[Pre-Estribillo]
Reconozco este dolor y ya sé dónde se esconde
Es verdad que estoy mejor, no hay problema que no afronte
Y aunque se apague mi voz y caiga en mil depresiones
No voy a sentirme menor, siempre luché con gigantes yo

[Estribillo]
Ya encontré la manera de decirme
Que no le temo a nada y siga firme
Y que hay que ser valiente' para irse

[Verso]
Echo dе menos a mami, ya quiero volver
Otra madrugada tе siento en mi soledad
Por desgracia pa' ganar tú tienes que perder
Y en este corazón yo tengo una herida
Es esta ambición también desmedida
No tengo otra opción, yo ya lo sabía
Que hago reggaetón, escribir no se olvida
Tuve una visión, nadie apostaría
Pero sí, cabrón, me lo juraría
Yo te pido perdón si fallé algún día
Pero, mami, yo y lo que daría
Y lo que daría
Otra noche más que se me ha hecho de día
Otra vez tú tienes flores y no son mías

track_title: That's Just The Way We Roll
lyrics:
16 ContributorsThat’s Just the Way We Roll Lyrics[Verse 1: Joe Jonas]
I woke up on my roof with my brothers
There's a whale in the pool with my mother
And my dad paints the house different colors
Where would we be if we couldn't dream?

[Chorus: Nick Jonas]
And I know we get a little crazy
And I know we get a little loud
And I know we're never gonna fake it
We are wild, we are free, we are more than you think
So call us freaks, but that's just the way we roll

[Verse 2: Joe Jonas]
You've got moves, I've got shoes, let's go dancing
Pop and lock, battle dance against Hanson
If we lose, all the girls, they'll be laughing
Where would we be if we couldn't dream?

[Chorus: Nick Jonas]
And I know we get a little crazy
And I know we get a little loud
And I know we're never gonna fake it
We are wild, we are free, we are more than you think
So call us freaks, but that's just the way we roll


[Bridge: Joe Jonas]
'Cause we're old enough to know
We're never letting go
'Cause that's just the way we roll

[Chorus: Nick Jonas]
'Cause I know we get a little crazy
And I know we get a little loud
And I know we're never gonna fake it
We are wild, we are free, we are more than you think
So call us freaks, but that's just the way we roll
And I know we get a little crazy
And I know we get a little loud
And I know we're never gonna fake it
We are wild, we are free, we are more than you think
So call us freaks 'cause that's just the way we roll
That's just the way we roll
Oh, that's just the way we roll

22 ContributorsHold On Lyrics[Verse 1: Joe Jonas, Nick Jonas & Kevin Jonas]
We don't have time left to regret (Hold on)
It will take more than common sense (Hold on)
So stop your wondering, take a stand (Hold on)
'Cause there's more to life than just to live (Hold on)

[Chorus: Nick Jonas & Joe Jonas]
'Cause an empty room can be so loud
It's too many tears to drown them out
So hold on (Hold on), hold on (Hold on)

[Verse 2: Joe Jonas & Nick Jonas, Nick Jonas & Kevin Jonas]
One single smile, a helping hand (Hold on)
It's not that hard to be a friend (Hold on)
So don't give up, stand 'til the end (Hold on)
'Cause there's more to life than just to live (Hold on)

[Chorus: Nick Jonas & Joe Jonas]
'Cause an empty room can be so loud
It's too many tears to drown them out
So hold on (Hold on), hold on (Hold on)
When you love someone and they break your heart
Don't give up on love, have faith, restart
Just hold on (Hold on), hold on (Hold on)

[Bridge: Nick Jonas]
When it falls apart
And you're feeling lost
All your hope is gone
Don't forget to hold on, hold on


[Chorus: Nick Jonas, Joe Jonas, Nick Jonas & Kevin Jonas]
'Cause an empty room can be so loud
It's too many tears to drown them out
So hold on (Hold on), hold on (Hold on)
When you love someone and they break your heart
Don't give up on love, have faith, restart
Just hold on (Hold on), hold on (Hold on)
'Cause an empty room can be so loud
It's too many tears to drown them out
So hold on (Hold on), hold on (Hold on)
When you love someone and they break your heart
Don't give up on love, have faith, restart
Just hold on (Hold on), hold on (Hold on)

12 ContributorsBB Good Lyrics[Verse 1: Joe Jonas]
I'll pick you up at seven, we can drive around and see a movie
Every scene will have a meaning, but you'll be the one that moves me
I've been hurt before, so baby, promise that you're gonna be true
I'm gonna be, be good so tell me that you're gonna be good too, yeah

[Chorus: Joe Jonas]
You gotta be, be good to me
I'm gonna be, be good to you
We'll be happy as can be
Just gotta be, be good to me
Baby

[Verse 2: Joe Jonas]
I'm gonna treat you right, we'll never fight
Now, baby, you can trust me
When I hold you tight, I feel alright
I guess that I'm just lucky
I've been hurt before, so baby, promise that you're gonna be true
I'm gonna be, be good so tell me that you're gonna be good, too

[Chorus: Joe Jonas]
You gotta be, be good to me
I'm gonna be, be good to you

lyrics:

Here comes Santa Claus, here comes Santa Claus

Right down Santa Claus Lane

For he loves you just the same

That makes everything right

'Cause Santa Claus comes tonight


[Verse 4]

'Cause Santa Clause comes tonight

lyrics:
